LanguageData.VME_LeaderConversionRitual.label: conversion ritual (leader)
LanguageData.VME_LeaderConversionRitual.description: Try to persuade someone to adopt your beliefs. If it goes well, they will lose some certainty in their ideoligion and may convert. If it backfires, they will gain certainty in their old beliefs.\n\nTo start this ritual at a specific place, select a ritual spot or matching altar/ideogram.
LanguageData.VME_LeaderConvert.label: convert (leader)
LanguageData.VME_LeaderConvert.description: Attempt to convert someone to the speaker's ideoligion. This will reduce the target's certainty in their own beliefs. The certainty reduction depends on the speaker's negotiation ability.
LanguageData.VME_LeaderPreachHealth.label: preach health (leader)
LanguageData.VME_LeaderPreachHealth.description: Preach moral strength to a sick or wounded person through the concepts of your ideology. This will improve their rate of wound healing and immunity gain.
LanguageData.VME_LeaderReassure.label: reassure (leader)
LanguageData.VME_LeaderReassure.description: Increase someone's certainty in their own beliefs. The regained certainty is based on the speaker's negotiation ability.
LanguageData.VME_LeaderCounsel.label: Counsel (leader)
LanguageData.VME_LeaderCounsel.description: Offer counsel to a person to cancel the effect of a sad memory. The chance of success depends on the speaker's social skills and their relationship with the listener.
